brainly_data.question: In the prologue of oedipus rex, ________ returns from delphi with a command from the oracle to find and punish the murderer of laius.
brainly_data.subject: English

all_answers.question: In the prologue of oedipus rex, ________ returns from delphi with a command from the oracle to find and punish the murderer of laius.
all_answers.subject: English
all_answers.text:
The correct answer is Creon.

Oedipus sends Creon to the oracle at Delphi to learn how to save Thebes. Creon reports that the city can only be saved by finding and punishing the murder of the previous king, Laius.
